API Reference¶

Filter¶

class flask_sqlalchemy_jsonapi.FilterParameter(field, schema, values)[source]¶

The FilterParameter object is responsible for generating a filter for exactly one query parameter, value pair.

Parameters:
  • field – A string reference to a marshmallow schema field.
  • values – A string-list of values delineated by a comma.
  • schema – A marshmallow schema object.
static filter_by(query, values)[source]¶

A filtering helper function that applies a set of objects filter parameters to a given query object.

Parameters:
  • query – A SQLAlchemy query object.
  • values – A list of FilterParameter instances.
classmethod generate(schema, parameters)[source]¶

A FilterParameter generator method. This method takes a dictionary of parameter, value pairs, finds all the fields wrapped in filter[], and filters the field by the given values.

Parameters:
  • schema – A marshmallow schema object.
  • parameters – A dictionary of parameter, value pairs.
prepare_strategies(values)[source]¶

Takes a list of values and applies a query filter based on the column being filtered’s type.

Parameters:values – A list of type appropriate values to sort by.
prepare_values(values)[source]¶

For a given set of values, cast each value according to the column being filtered’s type.

Parameters:values – A list of string values to cast.

Sort¶

class flask_sqlalchemy_jsonapi.SortValue(schema, value)[source]¶

The SortValue object is responsible for formatting a field value as a valid, sorted query expression.

Parameters:
  • schema – A marshmallow schema object.
  • value – A string value that represents a path to a field. Values can be specified with a . which will represent a logical break between the relationship field and its related schema’s attribute.
classmethod generate(schema, values)[source]¶

A SortValue generator method. This method takes a given set of strings and converts them into SortValue objects. If the string can not be converted, an error is marshaled as a member of a string list.

Parameters:
  • schema – A marshmallow schema object.
  • values – A list of strings that represent field names on the provided schema.
static sort_by(query, values)[source]¶

A sorting helper function that joins the appropriate tables and implements column sorting through the preferred approach.

Parameters:
  • query – A SQLAlchemy query object.
  • values – A list of SortValue instances.

Include¶

class flask_sqlalchemy_jsonapi.IncludeValue(schema, value, id_field='id')[source]¶

The IncludeValue object is responsible for validating the provided fields and including a properly serialized data response based on the relationships present on the primary resource.

Parameters:
  • schema – A marshmallow schema object.
  • value – A string value representing a relationship field on the provided marshmallow schema.
  • id_field – A string representation of a SQLAlchemy model column primary key.
static include(includes, model)[source]¶

An including helper function that constructs the proper include response.

Parameters:
  • includes – A list of IncludeValue instances.
  • model – A SQLAlchemy model instance.

Errors¶
